notes.title: Welcome to Advanced Notes App
notes.content:
This is your comprehensive notes application! Features include:

🎤 Voice recording with pause/resume
📁 Organized categories and tags
🔍 Advanced search capabilities
📤 Export/import functionality
🎨 Multiple themes and layouts

Try exploring all the features and create your first note!

notes.title: Project Meeting - Q4 Planning
notes.content:
📅 Date: July 15, 2024
👥 Attendees: Team leads, Product Manager, Design Lead

📋 Agenda:
1. Q4 Roadmap Review
2. Resource Allocation
3. Timeline Milestones
4. Risk Assessment

🎯 Key Decisions:
• Prioritize mobile app development
• Allocate 3 developers to backend optimization
• Design system overhaul scheduled for August
• User testing begins in September

📝 Action Items:
• John: Finalize technical specifications (Due: July 20)
• Sarah: Create wireframes for new features (Due: July 25)
• Mike: Set up testing environment (Due: July 22)

📞 Next Meeting: July 29, 2024 at 2:00 PM

notes.title: JavaScript Advanced Concepts Study
notes.content:
📚 Study Session: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
📅 Date: July 18, 2024

🎯 Topics Covered:

1️⃣ **Closures & Scope**
• Lexical scoping rules
• Function factories
• Memory considerations
• Practical applications

2️⃣ **Async Programming**
• Promises vs async/await
• Error handling in async code
• Promise.all() and Promise.race()
• Callback hell solutions

3️⃣ **ES6+ Features**
• Destructuring assignment
• Template literals
• Arrow functions scope
• Spread/rest operators
• Module imports/exports

4️⃣ **DOM Manipulation**
• Event delegation
• Virtual DOM concepts
• Performance optimization
• Modern DOM APIs

📝 Practice Projects:
• Build a todo app with local storage
• Create async data fetching utility
• Implement custom event emitter

📖 Next Study Topics:
• Web Workers
• Service Workers
• WebAssembly basics
• Performance profiling

notes.title: 2024 Reading Challenge
notes.content:

📝 **Currently Reading:**
• "The Pragmatic Programmer" (Technical)

📋 **Next in Queue:**
• "Dune" - Frank Herbert
• "The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck"

💭 **Reading Notes:**

🎯 **Genres to Explore More:**
• Science fiction
• Biographies
• Philosophy
• History

notes.title: Home Workout Routine
notes.content:
💪 Daily Home Workout Plan
⏰ Duration: 45 minutes
📅 Schedule: Monday, Wednesday, Friday

🔥 **Warm-up (10 minutes):**
• 5 minutes light jogging in place
• Arm circles (30 seconds each direction)
• Leg swings (30 seconds each leg)
• Dynamic stretches

💪 **Strength Training (25 minutes):**

🏋️ **Upper Body (12 minutes):**
• Push-ups: 3 sets x 12 reps
• Pike push-ups: 3 sets x 8 reps
• Tricep dips: 3 sets x 10 reps
• Plank: 3 sets x 45 seconds

🦵 **Lower Body (13 minutes):**
• Squats: 3 sets x 15 reps
• Lunges: 3 sets x 12 reps (each leg)
• Single-leg glute bridges: 3 sets x 10 reps
• Wall sit: 3 sets x 30 seconds
• Calf raises: 3 sets x 20 reps

🧘 **Cool Down (10 minutes):**
• Static stretching routine
• Deep breathing exercises
• Foam rolling (if available)

📊 **Progress Tracking:**
• Week 1: Completed 3/3 sessions ✅
• Week 2: Completed 3/3 sessions ✅
• Week 3: Completed 2/3 sessions ⚠️
• Week 4: In progress...

🎯 **Goals:**
• Increase push-ups to 15 reps by month end
• Hold plank for 60 seconds
• Add resistance bands to routine

💡 **Notes:**
• Best time: Early morning (7 AM)
• Keep water bottle nearby
• Play upbeat music for motivation
• Track weight and measurements weekly
